required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Mitopure (Urolithin A) on Skeletal Muscle Function, Iron Metabolism and Endurance Performance
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Trial to Evaluate the Effects of Mitopure (Urolithin A) on Skeletal Muscle Function, Iron Metabolism and Endurance Performance in Athletes

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study enrolling 36 (16 Elite and 20 Sub-Elite trained endurance runners (18 placebo and 18 Mitopure intervention) who are 18-40 years of age. Mitopure or Placebo supplement, will be given as a daily oral dose for 4-weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma levels over time of creatine kinase (CK)
Change in race performance time during a 3000 m track race in elite runners

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in aerobic capacity (VO2max)
Change from baseline in running economy via indirect calorimetry
Change from baseline in lean body mass via Dual-energy X-ray Absorptiometry (DXA)
Change from baseline in body fat mass via Dual-energy X-ray Absorptiometry (DXA)
Change from baseline in Resting Metabolic Rate (RMR)
Change from baseline in maximal muscle strength during 1-repetition maximum leg press
change in iron absorption and hemoglobin mass via determination of carboxyhaemoglobin (percent HbCO)
Change in acylcarnitines levels via metabolomics in plasma
change in mitochondrial function via respirometry in muscle biopsies (sub-elite runners only)
change in mitochondrial gene expression via RNA-seq in muscle biopsies (sub-elite runners only)
change in plasma levels of Urolithin A
change in plasma levels of inflammatory marker CRP

intervention.description: Softgel containing 250 mg of Urolithin A (Mitopure) with excipients. 4 soft-gels to be taken daily
Softgel containing only excipients. 4 soft-gels to be taken daily

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age between 18-40 years
- Participants will be running >100 km/week
- Elite participants will be required to have a 3,000 m running personal best time below 9:00 (mm:ss), and/or a VO2max result greater than 65 ml路kg-1路min-1
- The sub-elite cohort will have a 3,000 m running personal best faster than 10:00 min and/or a VO2max >60 ml路kg-1路min-1
- Agree to participate in one of two ~4 week training camps been held between March-October 2021.
- Signed informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with diagnosed medical conditions involving thyroid function or other chronic disturbances of metabolic rate
- Subjects who are unable to complete the training or testing protocols

eligibility.gender_description: Trained elite and sub-elite male runners will participate in a sports training camp

facility.name: Australian Catholic University/Australian Institute of Sports
